subject: Fwd: Thanks, we accepted your refinance appication
body:
Your your credit report doesn't matter to us!
 
If your family OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this lot will expire THIS NIGHT):

AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest payments!
 
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this elementary form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
